StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateRecrui.ngPersonInTrainingEnvnmt]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN varchar(9), @OrgID int, @MOS varchar(4), @TourBeginDate date, @LastName varchar(20), @FirstName varchar(20), @MidName varchar(20), @Su.x varchar(5), @Recrui.ngRole varchar(2), @Rank varchar(10), @UserLogin varchar(15)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @PersonID int
INSERT INTO MCRISS.[dbo].[PERSON] ([SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER] ,[FIRST_NAME] ,[LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME] ,[LAST_NAME] ,[SUFFIX_CD] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid]) VALUES (@SSN ,@FirstName ,@MidName ,@LastName ,@Su.x ,@UserLogin ,GETDATE() ,NEWID() )
SET @PersonID = @@IDENTITY
INSERT INTO MCRISS.[dbo].[MARINE] ([MARINE_ID] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid] ) VALUES (@PersonID ,@UserLogin ,GETDATE() ,NEWID() )
DECLARE @BilletBeginDate date.me SET @BilletBeginDate=@TourBeginDate
--- GET MCC CODE DECLARE @PresentMCC varchar(3) SELECT @PresentMCC = MCC_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID
--- DEFINE PAY GRADE DECLARE @PayGrade varchar(3) SELECT @PayGrade = COALESCE((SELECT TOP 1 PAY_GRADE_CODE FROM PAY_GRADE WHERE RANK_CODE = @Rank ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE ASC), SPACE(0))
-- BIZ: All Recrui.ng Persons MUST already be in the MARINE table. -- MARINE IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MARINE WHERE MARINE_ID = @PersonID) BEGIN UPDATE MARINE SET PRESENT_MONITORED_COMMAND_CODE = @PresentMCC, PRESENT_GRADE_CODE = @PayGrade, BILLET_MOS = @MOS, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_ID = @PersonID END
-- RECRUITING_PERSON IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RECRUITING_PERSON WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID) BEGIN UPDATE RECRUITING_PERSON SET ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID, RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = @Recrui.ngRole, RANK_CODE = @Rank, PAY_GRADE_CODE = @PayGrade, DELETED = 'N', TOUR_BEGIN_DATE = @TourBeginDate, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE = @BilletBeginDate, IS_ASSIGNED = 'N', ON_PRODUCTION = 'N', USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE(), MANUAL_ADD = 1 WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO RECRUITING_PERSON ( RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, RANK_CODE, PAY_GRADE_CODE, DELETED, TOUR_BEGIN_DATE, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, IS_ASSIGNED, ON_PRODUCTION, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE, MANUAL_ADD ) VALUES (@PersonID, @OrgID, @Recrui.ngRole, @Rank, @PayGrade, 'N', @TourBeginDate, @BilletBeginDate, 'N', 'N', @UserLogin, GETDATE(), 1) END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
